articles.title: Iraqi prime minister survives assassination attempt in Baghdad
articles.description: Iraqi Prime Minister Mustafa Al-Kadhimi survived an armed drone attack at his home on Sunday. The attack comes two days after violent unrest over recent election results disputed by Iran-backed militia groups. Imtiaz Tyab reports.

articles.title: Capitol riot defendant who pleaded guilty to assaulting police sentenced
articles.description: Ex-MMA fighter Scott Fairlamb received the harshest sentence imposed yet for the attack.
